languages.text: "Честную сделку, шерин". {n}В глазах Джай разгорается сдерживаемый азарт.{/n} "Если ваша душа пожелает — мы разделим возвращенный груз... пополам. Так будет справедливо. Ну а если товары невероятной редкости вас не интересуют, я с готовностью покрою хлопоты парой бумаг, сравнимых по ценности с парой набитых трюмов".

"A fair deal, shereen." {n}Bridled excitement simmers in Jae's eyes.{/n} "If your heart desires, we'll split the recovered cargo... fifty-fifty. That will be fair. But if goods of incredible rarity do not interest you, then I'll make it worth your while with some bonds equal in value to a couple of full holds."
languages.original_text: "Честную сделку, шерин". {n}В глазах Джай разгорается сдерживаемый азарт.{/n} "Если ваша душа пожелает — мы разделим возвращенный груз... пополам. Так будет справедливо. Ну а если товары невероятной редкости вас не интересуют, я с готовностью покрою хлопоты парой бумаг, сравнимых по ценности с парой набитых трюмов".

But if goods of incredible rarity do not interest you, then I'll make it worth your while with some bonds equal in value to a couple of full holds."

But if goods of incredible rarity do not interest you, then I'll make it worth your while with some bonds equal in value to a couple of full holds."

"A fair deal, shereen." {n}Bridled excitement simmers in Jae's eyes.{/n} "If your heart desires, we'll split the recovered cargo... fifty-fifty. That will be fair. But if goods of incredible rarity do not interest you, then I'll make it worth your while with some bonds equal in value to a couple of full holds."

"A fair deal, shereen." {n}Bridled excitement simmers in Jae's eyes.{/n} "If your heart desires, we'll split the recovered cargo... fifty-fifty. That will be fair. But if goods of incredible rarity do not interest you, then I'll make it worth your while with some bonds equal in value to a couple of full holds."

languages.text: “我们可以公平交易，亲爱的。”{n}婕伊的目光中充满了兴奋之意。{/n}“如果你愿意的话，我们可以把收回来的货物对半分……五五开，这样才公平。不过，如果你对那些极其稀有的东西不感兴趣的话，我也可以用债券来付账，价值和那两箱货相抵。我绝不会浪费你的时间。”
languages.original_text: "A fair deal, shereen." {n}Bridled excitement simmers in Jae's eyes.{/n} "If your heart desires, we'll split the recovered cargo... fifty-fifty. That will be fair. But if goods of incredible rarity do not interest you, then I'll make it worth your while with some bonds equal in value to a couple of full holds."

traits.locale_text: “我们可以公平交易，亲爱的。”{n}婕伊的目光中充满了兴奋之意。{/n}“如果你愿意的话，我们可以把收回来的货物对半分……五五开，这样才公平。不过，如果你对那些极其稀有的东西不感兴趣的话，我也可以用债券来付账，价值和那两箱货相抵。我绝不会浪费你的时间。”

languages.text: «Me parece justo, shereen». {n}Una emoción contenida arde en los ojos de Jae.{/n} «Si le interesa, podríamos repartirnos la carga recuperada... cincuenta-cincuenta. Es lo justo. Pero si no le interesan los recursos de esa índole, se lo compensaré con bonos de valor comparable a varias bodegas llenas».
languages.original_text: "A fair deal, shereen." {n}Bridled excitement simmers in Jae's eyes.{/n} "If your heart desires, we'll split the recovered cargo... fifty-fifty. That will be fair. But if goods of incredible rarity do not interest you, then I'll make it worth your while with some bonds equal in value to a couple of full holds."

traits.locale_text: «Me parece justo, shereen». {n}Una emoción contenida arde en los ojos de Jae.{/n} «Si le interesa, podríamos repartirnos la carga recuperada... cincuenta-cincuenta. Es lo justo. Pero si no le interesan los recursos de esa índole, se lo compensaré con bonos de valor comparable a varias bodegas llenas».

languages.text: 「フェアな取引だね、シャリーン」{n}ジェイの目には、興奮の色が浮かんでいる。{/n}「アンタが望むなら、回収した貨物は折半しよう…五分五分でね。それで公平でしょ？でも、アンタが驚くほどに希少な品に興味がなけりゃ、船の貨物室複数個分の価値がある債権を用意してあげるよ」
languages.original_text: "A fair deal, shereen." {n}Bridled excitement simmers in Jae's eyes.{/n} "If your heart desires, we'll split the recovered cargo... fifty-fifty. That will be fair. But if goods of incredible rarity do not interest you, then I'll make it worth your while with some bonds equal in value to a couple of full holds."

traits.locale_text: 「フェアな取引だね、シャリーン」{n}ジェイの目には、興奮の色が浮かんでいる。{/n}「アンタが望むなら、回収した貨物は折半しよう…五分五分でね。それで公平でしょ？でも、アンタが驚くほどに希少な品に興味がなけりゃ、船の貨物室複数個分の価値がある債権を用意してあげるよ」

languages.text: {n}Les yeux de Jae brillent d'une excitation contenue.{/n} « Marché conclu, shereen. Si tel est votre désir, nous nous partagerons la marchandise... cinquante-cinquante. Ça me paraît équitable. Mais si jamais ces marchandises extrêmement rares ne vous intéressent pas, je vous dédommagerai avec quelques obligations d'une valeur égale à plusieurs cales pleines. »
languages.original_text: "A fair deal, shereen." {n}Bridled excitement simmers in Jae's eyes.{/n} "If your heart desires, we'll split the recovered cargo... fifty-fifty. That will be fair. But if goods of incredible rarity do not interest you, then I'll make it worth your while with some bonds equal in value to a couple of full holds."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux de Jae brillent d'une excitation contenue.{/n} « Marché conclu, shereen. Si tel est votre désir, nous nous partagerons la marchandise... cinquante-cinquante. Ça me paraît équitable. Mais si jamais ces marchandises extrêmement rares ne vous intéressent pas, je vous dédommagerai avec quelques obligations d'une valeur égale à plusieurs cales pleines. »

languages.text: "Ein gerechter Handel, Shereen." {n}Gedämpfte Aufregung funkelt in Jaes Augen.{/n} "Wenn Euer Herz es begehrt, teilen wir die geborgene Fracht ... fünfzig-fünfzig. Das ist doch gerecht. Wenn Ihr aber kein Interesse an Waren von unglaublicher Seltenheit habt, dann entlohne ich Euch stattdessen mit Schuldverschreibungen im Wert mehrerer randvoller Frachträume."
languages.original_text: "A fair deal, shereen." {n}Bridled excitement simmers in Jae's eyes.{/n} "If your heart desires, we'll split the recovered cargo... fifty-fifty. That will be fair. But if goods of incredible rarity do not interest you, then I'll make it worth your while with some bonds equal in value to a couple of full holds."

traits.locale_text: "Ein gerechter Handel, Shereen." {n}Gedämpfte Aufregung funkelt in Jaes Augen.{/n} "Wenn Euer Herz es begehrt, teilen wir die geborgene Fracht ... fünfzig-fünfzig. Das ist doch gerecht. Wenn Ihr aber kein Interesse an Waren von unglaublicher Seltenheit habt, dann entlohne ich Euch stattdessen mit Schuldverschreibungen im Wert mehrerer randvoller Frachträume."

languages.original_text: "A fair deal, shereen." {n}Bridled excitement simmers in Jae's eyes.{/n} "If your heart desires, we'll split the recovered cargo... fifty-fifty. That will be fair. But if goods of incredible rarity do not interest you, then I'll make it worth your while with some bonds equal in value to a couple of full holds."

languages.text: "Gayet adil bir anlaşma şirinim." {n}Jae'ın gözlerinden, içten içe kaynadığı heyecanı belli oluyor.{/n} "Dilersen geri alacağımız kargoyu yarı yarıya bölüşürüz. Kardeş payı yani. Yok, muazzam nadidelikteki mallar ilgini çekmezse de bir çift dolu ambar değerinde senetle, zahmetinin karşılığını öderim."
languages.original_text: "A fair deal, shereen." {n}Bridled excitement simmers in Jae's eyes.{/n} "If your heart desires, we'll split the recovered cargo... fifty-fifty. That will be fair. But if goods of incredible rarity do not interest you, then I'll make it worth your while with some bonds equal in value to a couple of full holds."

traits.locale_text: "Adil bir teklifim var şirinim." {n}Jae'ın gözlerinden, dizginlediği heyecanın arttığı belli oluyor.{/n} "Eğer istersen, geri aldığımız kargoyu yarı yarıya bölüşürüz...Kardeş payı. Yok, inanılmaz nadirlikte mallar da ilgini çekmezse, koca bir çift ambar değerindeki bonolarımla ayırdığın vaktin karşılığını öderim."
